message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[18-May-2025 04:16:31 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_kt_redirect ( id mediumint(9) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, rdct_time datetime DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' NOT NULL, rdct_title varchar(255) NULL, rdct_dest_link varchar(255) NULL, rdct_assign_posts text NULL, rdct_menus VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, rdct_status TINYINT(2) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id (id) )

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
